settings.title: Take Everything With You
settings.content: Featuring soft leather handles for easy carry, a tough and spill-proof inner lining, and a chic look that's sure to turn heads, this bag will have you going everywhere, with everything, in style.

settings.title: Bags for Global Citizens
settings.content: We believe that the commonality between currencies, flags and languages is people. It is people who are the innovators, the advocates, and the revolutionaries. Apolis is a small group of social entrepreneurs who believe that the most valuable practice in creating lasting change is by investing in people.

settings.title: The Evolution of Your Apolis Bag
settings.content: Watch how your Apolis bag starts from a jute seed and grows into a market bag!

settings.title: About Us
settings.content:
(uh-paul-is) means Global Citizen™

Share YOUR unique voice by customizing the Original Apolis® Market Bag

settings.title: Don't Miss Out!
settings.subheading: Weekly we release a new limited version of the Original Apolis® Market Bag. Sign up to get early access!

settings.text: We use cookies to improve your shopping experience. By continuing, you consent to the use of cookies.

settings.title: Take Everything With You
settings.content: Take it to the grocery store, stuff yourself at the park, carry gear for the kids... the possibilities are endless. Customize your bag and create a moment out of everything.

settings.title: I have questions about accessibility.
settings.answer:
We are continually working to improve the accessibility of our site. You can read more here.

CONTACT US

Email: hello@apolisglobal.com
Hours of operation: Monday – Friday, 6am-9pm PST

settings.title: What are your minimums and timeline?
settings.answer: Our minimum order quantity is 25 units. If you order more than 49 units you save $2. Our standard production timeline is 21 business days. We provide an option to rush your order within 10-business days for an extra $2 per bag.

settings.title: Can I order a bag without any artwork or product information?
settings.answer: Yes, you can have no artwork on one side, but all our bags include product information on the other. We do not offer bags that are blank on both sides.

settings.title: What is your privacy & data policy?
settings.answer: You can read our privacy and data policy here.

settings.title: How does my purchase help others?
settings.answer: Every market bag is handcrafted in Bangladesh by mothers who receive Fair Trade-certified wages, annual profit dividends, and a retirement fund; read Forbes.com’s article on how this approach is changing people’s lives, with 1,002,726 bag owners and counting. The bags are then shipped to Los Angeles, California, where a growing team of 13 production associates print each bag with water-based ink onto the bag.

settings.title: When will my bag be back in stock?
settings.answer: Bag restocks vary throughout the year. Please add your email to the product page for the bag you’d like. You can find it on the right hand side. Click where it says “Notify Me.” You can also email us for more information.

settings.title: I’m interested in working for Apolis. Are you hiring?
settings.answer: We’re currently not looking for new talent, but please send your resume to work@apolisglobal.com for possible future consideration.

settings.title: Do you ship overseas?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship internationally. Orders go out every Friday. To make it simple for you, we offer a way to pay international customs fees upfront. Customs fees and duties are included in the shipping price calculated during checkout. This will expedite delivery, make the order process more reliable and keep the costs down. Delivery is approximately 14 business days.

settings.title: What are your terms of service?
settings.answer: You can read our Terms of Service on this page.

settings.title: Where are the products made?
settings.answer: Bags: Every market bag is handcrafted in Bangladesh by mothers who receive Fair Trade-certified wages, annual profit dividends, and a retirement fund; read Forbes.com’s article on how this approach is changing people’s lives, with 665,000 bag owners and counting. The bags are then shipped to Los Angeles, California, where a growing team of 13 production associates print each bag with water-based ink onto the bag.

settings.title: What payment methods do you accept?
settings.answer: We gladly accept Visa, MasterCard, and American Express credit cards as well as PayPal, Amazon Payments, and Apple Pay. Apolis cannot accept cash, checks, or money orders. Sales tax will be added to all orders shipped in California. With Afterpay, enjoy 4 interest-free payments over 6-weeks.

settings.title: What shipping carriers do you use?
settings.answer: We use all major carriers and local courier partners. You’ll be asked to select a delivery speed during checkout. The majority of our USA shipments for customizable items are sent via the United States Postal Service.

settings.title: Do you ship to P.O. boxes?
settings.answer: Yes, we do.

settings.title: Can I get my product personalized?
settings.answer: Yes! Bags and masks are customized in Los Angeles, California, where a growing team of 13 production associates prints each item with water-based ink.

settings.title: My artwork doesn’t fit on the bag. Can I add extra characters?
settings.answer:
Artwork is normally limited to around 13 characters per line, including spaces (unless it’s a monogrammed bag, which allows up to three characters). However, we’re able to manually add additional ones in some cases, up to 15.  

If you’re not able to fit it all online, please place your order and reach out to service@apolisglobal.com with your desired artwork.

Our embroidered and calligraphy bags allow a maximum of 12 characters per line.

Please note we are not able to add additonal characters to our Shoulder Market Bags in Safari and Natural.

settings.title: I bought my favorite cologne/t-shirt/jacket from Apolis. Why is it no longer offered?
settings.answer: We’ve decided to focus solely on bringing you the best market bags, totes, and backpacks. However, those items sometimes pop un Poshmark. Check here. And read more about our clothing here.

settings.title: How do I care for my new bag?
settings.answer:
We recommend these general cleaning tips for all our bags:

1) Turn the bag inside out.

2) Wash the inside with soap and water -the bag is water resistant, so this will not harm it- or use a disinfectant spray.

3) Wipe handles with soap and water.

4) Air dry.

settings.title: How do I use my gift card?
settings.answer:
You'll find the discount code box at checkout. 

If you're on a PC or laptop, you'll see it at the right side of your screen when you enter your shipping details. If you're using a smartphone or tablet you'll need to enter your info and shipping method before you'll see the discount code box.

Please note the system allows one discount per order.

settings.title: Do you accept returns?
settings.answer:
Yes! We stand behind the quality of every Apolis product with a 30-day money-back guarantee.

Please note, return procedures for customized and non-customized products differ. To keep things simple for you, we offer refunds instead of exchanges. 

To return non-customized  items please note: Items need to be postmarked within 30 calendar days of receipt for a refund to your original method of payment or store credit. Original shipping charges are non-refundable. Items must be returned in their original condition (unused, unwashed, unaltered) with the original packaging and tags attached. 

To return customized items please note: Customized products are not eligible for a return unless you encounter a craftsmanship or quality issue which includes: If your bag arrives with rivets missing or a damaged handle. If your bag arrives with smudged print. If your bag arrives with text that is slanted or cut off.

Please note: since each bag is handmade, there will be slight variations in jute texture from bag to bag; no two bags will look exactly the same. Additionally, bags suffering from general wear and tear are not eligible for return. Items purchased from other retail partners are not eligible for returns.

To initiate a possible return, email us (support_email) or text us (sms_number) with an image of your bag and a description of the issue and we'll get back to you ASAP with an answer.

If your bag does not meet the requirements above, a refund will not be issued, and if you sent your bag to us, you will receive it back.

settings.title: I misspelled/would like to change my artwork. Help!
settings.answer: Please contact us through chat or at service@apolisglobal.com. Depending on the timeframe, we may be able to help.

settings.title: Do you offer discounts for bulk purchases?
settings.answer: Indeed. Your discount will be automatically applied for orders of 30+ bags. We offer greater discounts for wholesale purchases of 25+ but with a longer processing time.

settings.title: Are your bags sold in a store near me?
settings.answer: Please email wholesale@apolisglobal.com with your address for a list of stores in your area. Be sure to call the store beforehand as stock varies daily.

settings.title: When will I get my product?
settings.answer:
Before we ship, the product goes through a special print customization process to add your artwork.

Our bags take 3 business days to customize. If you need it fast, you have the option to shorten the customization phase to 1 business day and ship the bag the following day (rush processing).

We charge a small fee for rush processing. If your order is  placed before 11pm PST, it will be shipped the next business day.

Shipping to the U.S. (Excluding Alaska & Hawaii):

Estimated standard delivery is  4 to 7 business days. Please allow an extra day for some rural locations. Shipping to Alaska & Hawaii: Estimated delivery is 3 to 5 business days. (Orders over $150.00 USD qualify for free Ground shipping.) Overnight orders must be submitted Monday through Thursday by 8 AM PST. Overnight orders placed on Thursday after 8AM PST through Friday 8AM PST will arrive the following Monday. Overnight orders placed on Friday after 8AM PST through Monday 8AM PST will arrive Tuesday.

settings.title: Can I add emoticons or smileys on my bag?
settings.answer: Emoticons and smileys are not permitted. However, we do occasionally offer embroidered bags with the option to add a heart. Check here to see what’s in stock.

settings.title: I’m interested in a wholesale order. How can I get started?
settings.answer: Start here. Or schedule a one-on-one Apolis Market Bag design consultation here. If you'd rather contact us first, email wholesale@apolisglobal.com.

settings.title: Where can I find tracking information for my order?
settings.answer: Tracking information will be emailed within three days of your purchase. Tracking for embroidered and calligraphy bags will be sent once shipped.

settings.title: Do you offer gift cards?
settings.answer: Yes, we have electronic gift cards available for purchase. Find yours here.

settings.title: Can I order my natural-colored bag with white print?
settings.answer:
If there's no option to select white text noted on the product page, it's not available.

If you're interested in a wholesale order with white text, please contact them here.

settings.contact_info_text: If we still haven't answered your question, you can contact us below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
settings.contact_1_text: Text us at sms_number. We’re available daily 6AM–9PM PST.
settings.contact_2_text: Email hello@apolisglobal.com or use the form below.

settings.title: Easy Service

settings.title: Make it a Picnic
settings.content: We believe in fun, freedom, and being happy at every moment, so we designed fashionable, long-lasting market bags designed to live with you and your family through every occasion.

settings.newsletter_content: A short sentence describing what someone will receive by subscribing

settings.title: Investing in People
settings.content: Every market bag is handcrafted in Bangladesh by hundreds of mothers who receive Fair Trade-certified wages, annual profit dividends, and a retirement fund. The bags are then shipped to Los Angeles, California, where a growing team of 13 people print one-of-a-kind customizations onto the bag.
Tell more about your product, collection...

settings.title: Take Everything With You
settings.content: We believe in fun, freedom, and being happy at every moment with long-lasting market bags designed to carry everything and make a moment out of everything.

settings.title: Your title
settings.content:
Use this text to share information about your brand with your customers.
Describe a product, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.title: Your purchase helps shape the kind of world we live in.
settings.content: Our model of Advocacy Through Industry is a revolutionary way to harness the power of business to create social change. This model is founded on the simple idea that people can live better lives when they are given equal access to the global marketplace.

settings.title: Every Day Should be Special
settings.content: How many times have you left the house carrying too much? Or filled the smallest bags only to have everything fall out? Have you wished for a nicer looking bag for that perfect picture? We don't like looking clumsy either, so we created customizable market bags designed to carry everything and embellish every moment.

settings.title: Make it Yours with Customized Prints
settings.content: Every bag is customizable with any phrase you'd like. Add your family names, your brand's motto, or even your favorite cities!
